content.en: Neutron spectrum unfolding: Scientists have been exploring the use of various algorithms to unfold neutron spectra, which is important for understanding the energy distribution of neutrons. These algorithms, such as the Genetic Algorithm and Monte Carlo method, are used to optimize and obtain solutions for neutron spectrum unfolding. Different algorithms are compared and evaluated to determine their effectiveness in unfolding neutron spectra.
content.da: Neutron spektrum udfoldning: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer til at udfolde neutron spektre, hvilket er vigtigt for at forstå energifordelingen af neutroner. Disse algoritmer, såsom genetisk algoritme og Monte Carlo metoden, bruges til at optimere og opnå løsninger for neutron spektrum udfoldning. Forskellige algoritmer sammenlignes og evalueres for at bestemme deres effektivitet i udfoldning af neutron spektre.
